name: Back to Nature (Hensch-IT)
description:
• A Ludum Dare 45 Game
    • Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/back-to-nature
    • level are connected to a Open World
  • You can use the Crafting Machine, witch you con find in each level to craft protection and such
  • You can Upgrade your abilities by using Upgrade Items

Control:

  • W/S/A/D : move
  • Q : Inventory
  • E: Equip
  • Left mouse button: Attack
  • Right ,ouse button: Interact
